UI_visible_response: Li Shangfu was dismissed reportedly due to corruption probes1. He disappeared from public life for two months before his dismissal, which aligns with the reports suggesting he was under investigation for corruption1. Additionally, it is noted that he was removed from his positions as defense chief and state councilor2.
traffic_visible_response: Li Shangfu was dismissed reportedly due to corruption probes[[1]]. He disappeared from public life for two months before his dismissal, which aligns with the reports suggesting he was under investigation for corruption[[1]]. Additionally, it is noted that he was removed from his positions as defense chief and state councilor[[2]].
